headline: Equifax (EFX): Assessing Valuation After a 20% One-Year Share Price Pullback
summary: Equifax (EFX) has been a frustrating hold lately, with the stock down roughly 15% this year and about 20% over the past year, even as revenue and earnings keep growing. See our latest analysis for Equifax. That pullback lines up with a 90 day share price return of around negative 15 percent and a one year total shareholder return of roughly negative 20 percent. This suggests momentum has clearly cooled despite solid underlying growth. If Equifax’s recent slide has you reassessing your...
